casebody.data:
Jonathan MITCHELL
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 22, 2016

James E. Mortimer, in support of the petition.

Melissa Patterson, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Jonathan Mitchell's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 168 Conn.App. 903, 149 A.3d 503 (2016), is denied.
